command.name: services.storage.list
command.doc: The List Storage Accounts operation lists the storage accounts available under the current subscription.

command.name: services.storage.create
command.doc: The Create Storage Account operation creates a new storage account in Windows Azure.

command.name: services.storage.keys
command.doc: The Get Storage Keys operation returns the primary and secondary access keys for the specified storage account.

command.name: services.storage.delete
command.doc: The Delete Storage Account operation deletes the specified storage account from Windows Azure.
